feed.title: Track Awesome Cropsteering Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: Curated by IXYZ list of OpenSource projects in indoor/outdoor agriculture automation, crop steering and cannabis cultivation

entry.title: Awesome Cropsteering Updates on Mar 11 - Mar 17, 2024
entry.content:
Components / Tasmota Configs

  • M5 Stack - Standard 5×5cm functionally stacking modularized components hardware system

DIY / Modular systems

  • Hydromisc (⭐517) - A single PCBA with all the necessary I/O to automate a typical small to mid-size hydroponic grow, controllable over Wifi. It may also be suitable for aquariums, ponds, or any other biological or chemical process involving water treatment
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Mar 11 - Mar 17, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Cropsteering Updates on Feb 26 - Mar 03, 2024
entry.content:
Grow Automation

  • Potnanny (⭐1) - Potnanny turns your Raspberry Pi into powerful grow-room automation system using inexpensive, off-the-shelf Bluetooth sensors, power outlets, and other devices
entry.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Feb 26 - Mar 03, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Cropsteering Updates on Feb 19 - Feb 25, 2024
entry.content:
Components / Tasmota Configs

  • LILYGO - varous modiles and components. Good relay boards based on ESP32
  • Adafruit - Adafruit ESP32 modules

DIY / Modular systems

  • SENTSOR Core ESP32-EMBED (⭐9) - all-in-one, super low power development board based on latest revision of ESP32 chip. BOM, easyEDA PCB blueprints
entry.summary: 3 awesome projects updated on Feb 19 - Feb 25, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Cropsteering Updates on Feb 12 - Feb 18, 2024
entry.content:
AI/ML

  • OpenWeedLocator (⭐400) - Opensource hardware and software weed detector that uses entirely off-the-shelf componentry, very simple green-detection algorithms (with capacity to upgrade to in-crop detection) and 3D printable parts
  • Plant disease (⭐41) - Predictive model for cannabis sickness. One source identifies 30 types of cannabis ailments.

Grow Automation

  • DROMatic OS (⭐324) - The DRO-Matic OS has been built to automate nearly every aspect of hydroponic farming for you! From nutrient dosing to pH / EC drift fixing, feeding types to draining, top-offs and even timers; we have quantified everything you need to automate successful crops.
  • MudPi (⭐278) - A python package to gather sensor readings, trigger components, control devices and more in an event based system that can be run on a linux SBC, including Raspberry Pi
  • Mycodo (⭐3.1k) - Mycodo is open source software for the Raspberry Pi that couples inputs and outputs in interesting ways to sense and manipulate the environment
  • gardenAutomation (⭐494) - Garden Automation toolkit by LedGardener
  • WEGA-Box (⭐19) - Hydroponic system management toolkit

Calculators

  • WEGA-HPG (⭐175) - HPG Calculator

Node RED

  • Node-RED (⭐21k) - Low-code programming for event-driven applications

Node RED / Node RED flows

  • Home Automation Repository (⭐2) - repository contains configuration files for a home automation system, including various sensors, inputs, and automation scripts

Tasmota / Tasmota Configs

  • N/A

Home Assistant / Node RED plugins

  • Home Assistant (⭐80k) - Open source home automation that puts local control and privacy first. Powered by a worldwide community of tinkerers and DIY enthusiasts

Home Assistant / Home Assistant Automation

  • HAGR (⭐24) - Home Assistant Grow Room is a repository for grow automation related things for Home Assistant

Facility management / Home Assistant UI

  • OpenTHC (⭐8) - OpenTHC is an environment of web-based applications focused on helping Cannabis/Hemp and Organic Horticulture industry participants meet their regulatory requirements

Irrigation / Home Assistant UI

  • OpenSprinkler AVR/RPI/BBB Firmware (⭐503) - This is a unified OpenSprinkler firmware for Arduino, and Linux-based OpenSprinklers such as OpenSprinkler Pi
  • OpenMinder (⭐42) - Allows anyone to build a device that can monitor the rootzone of their plants to make the most optimum use of water and fertigation ingredients to ensure a happy plant. This is done by measuring the water going into the plants on the irrigation side, as well as coming out on the runoff side, thus allowing comparisons

ESPHome / Home Assistant UI

  • ESPHome (⭐9.6k) - ESPHome is a system to control your microcontrollers by simple yet powerful configuration files and control them remotely through Home Automation systems
  • PLF10 (⭐28) - KAUF Power Monitoring Smart Plug (PLF10)

ESPHome / ESPHome Configs

  • Aquaponics-Kit (⭐3) - Code for Atas Scientific Wi-Fi Aquaponics Kit to be compatable with ESPHome and HomeAssistant using Adafruit HUZZAH32 – ESP32 Feather Board

Tasmota / ESPHome Configs

  • Tasmota (⭐23k) - Alternative firmware for ESP8266 and ESP32 based devices with easy configuration using webUI, OTA updates, automation using timers or rules, expandability and entirely local control over MQTT, HTTP, Serial or KNX

Components / Tasmota Configs

  • Seed Studio - various modules and components based on ESP32 and other MCU

Components / Sensors

  • Atlas Scientific - T/H, Pressure, pH, EC, ORP probes and interface boards. Dosing pumps, flowmeters. Lab grade.

Components / MCU and SOC

  • ESP32 - A feature-rich MCU with integrated Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity for a wide-range of applications
  • Particle - hardware modules for IoT

Components / Modular systems

  • WisBlock by RAK Wireless - Create your own hardware with WisBlock Core, WisBlock Base and other WisBlock Modules

DIY / Modular systems

  • OpenSprinkler Hardware (⭐70) - OpenSprinkler Hardware Design files, made in EagleCAD software

Metrics and Logging / Modular systems

  • OS-RS485 (⭐2) - OpenSteering-RS485 Data logger
  • OpenSteering-SDI12 (⭐4) - SDI-12 Data logger, up to 62 addresses
  • TDR-Sensor (⭐5) - A TDR sensor that measures moisture content, EC, and temperature for Rockwool Substrates or Soil Substrates

Mixers and Dosers / Modular systems

  • WEGA-Mixer (⭐29) - WEGA-Mixer is a device for the automatic preparation of two-component complex fertilizers in liquids by precisely mixing their composition (RU, requires google translate).

MQTT / Modular systems

  • Mosquitto (⭐9.9k) - Mosquitto is an open source implementation of a server for version 5.0, 3.1.1, and 3.1 of the MQTT protocol
  • EMQX (⭐15k) - EMQX is the world's most scalable open-source MQTT broker with a high performance that connects 100M+ IoT devices in 1 cluster, while maintaining 1M message per second throughput and sub-millisecond latency.

Relay and power control / Modular systems

  • EC-POWERCONTROL (⭐0) - Edge controller power control for esp32

Visualization platforms / Modular systems

  • InfluxDB (⭐30k) - InfluxDB is an open source time series database
  • Grafana (⭐69k) - The open-source platform for monitoring and observability

Storing Data / Modular systems

  • Open TSDB (⭐5.1k) - OpenTSDB is a distributed, scalable Time Series Database (TSDB) written on top of HBase

Visualization Libraries / Modular systems

  • Giraffe (⭐186) - A React-based visualization library powering the data visualizations in the InfluxDB 2.0 UI
  • D3.js (⭐111k) - D3 (or D3.js) is a free, open-source JavaScript library for visualizing data. Its low-level approach built on web standards offers unparalleled flexibility in authoring dynamic, data-driven graphics

Zigbee / Modular systems

  • Zigbee2MQTT (⭐14k) - It bridges events and allows you to control your Zigbee devices via MQTT. In this way you can integrate your Zigbee devices with whatever smart home infrastructure you are using.

Crop Steering Guides / Modular systems

  • AGROWTEK Crop Steering Guide
  • Growlink Crop Steering E-Book V1.4
  • Some useful reading and links from Open Steering project

Other Awesome Lists / Modular systems

  • Awesome Agriculture (⭐1.5k)
  • Awesome ESP (⭐1.4k)
  • Awesome Home Assistant (⭐6.8k)
  • Awesome InfluxDB (⭐811)
  • Awesome IoT (⭐3.5k)
  • Awesome IoT & Hybrid (⭐574)
  • Awesome Open IoT (⭐661)
  • Awesome MQTT (⭐2.2k)
  • Awesome Open Hardware (⭐574)
  • Awesome Raspberry Pi (⭐15k)
entry.summary: 52 awesome projects updated on Feb 12 - Feb 18, 2024
